item.title: Projects
item.description:
Django Bare Migrate
Django Bare Migrate is a lightweight toolkit for managing Django migrations using raw SQL. It enables database migrations without relying on Djangoâ€™s ORM, allowing for greater flexibility and full control over schema changes. By providing Python-agnostic migration scripts, Django Bare Migrate simplifies versioning, execution, and rollback of database changes.

Python Backend Examples
A collection of Python-based backend application examples.

  • Django Polls REST API
  • Flask Polls REST API
